description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Old School Arcade Action for the 21st Century! Featuring adaptive gameplay, a host of awesome weaponry, stunning effects and a thumping soundtrack to match. Get those trigger fingers ready - this is Retro as it was meant to be played... NEW VERSION: Now supports classic dual-stick control for those who prefer this style of play.
description.short: Old School Arcade Action for the 21st Century! Featuring adaptive gameplay, a host of awesome weaponry, stunning effects and a thumping soundtrack to match. Get those trigger fingers ready - this is Retro as it was meant to be played... NEW VERSION: Now supports classic dual-stick control for those who prefer this style of play.
